examples: babies can discriminate between different facial expressions of emotion
synonyms: separate the sheep from the goats
separate the wheat from the chaff "he cannot discriminate between fact and fiction"

definitions.definition: perceive or constitute the difference in or between.
examples: bats can discriminate a difference in echo delay of between 69 and 98 millionths of a second

definitions.definition: make an unjust or prejudicial distinction in the treatment of different categories of people or things, especially on the grounds of race, sex, or age.
examples: existing employment policies discriminate against women
synonyms: single out; victimize "existing employment policies discriminate against women"
